mainBoard.name: Alandra, Sky Dreamer
mainBoard.originalText:
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.
Whenever you draw your fifth card each turn, Alandra, Sky Dreamer and Drakes you control each get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

rulings.text: The first triggered ability can trigger only once each turn. It doesn't matter whether Alandra, Sky Dreamer was on the battlefield when the first card was drawn. If it's not on the battlefield when the second card is drawn, the ability can't trigger at all that turn. It won't trigger when the third or fourth card is drawn.
The same is true for the last ability and the fifth card drawn.
The value of X is locked in as the last ability resolves. The bonus it grants won't change after that point, even if the number of cards in your hand does.

mainBoard.name: Faerie Vandal
mainBoard.originalText:
Flash
Flying
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Faerie Vandal.

rulings.text: If a spell or ability causes you to put cards into your hand without specifically using the word “draw,” it's not a card drawn.

If an effect instructs you to draw multiple cards, the ability triggers after you draw whichever is the second one for the turn. You choose a target (if any) for the ability after you've drawn and looked at all of the cards and finished resolving the spell or ability that caused you to draw them.

The triggered ability can trigger only once each turn. It doesn't matter whether the permanent with that ability was on the battlefield when the first card was drawn. If it's not on the battlefield when the second card is drawn, the ability can't trigger at all that turn. It won't trigger when the third or fourth card is drawn.

Roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Parfois le choix le plus difficile est entre deux merveilles. »
—Gadwick, le Brisquard
foreignData.name: Option
foreignData.text:
Regard 1. (Regardez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez la mettre au-dessous de votre bibliothèque.)
Piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Talvolta la scelta più difficile è tra due meraviglie."
—Gadwick, il Rugoso
foreignData.name: Opzione
foreignData.text:
Profetizza 1. (Guarda la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Puoi mettere quella carta in fondo al tuo grimorio.)
Pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText:
「時に難しい選択がある。二つの驚異から一方を選ぶときだ。」
――老いたる者、ガドウィック
foreignData.name: 選択
foreignData.text:
占術１を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上にあるカード１枚を見る。あなたはそのカードをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に置いてもよい。）
カード１枚を引く。

foreignData.flavorText:
「有时候，在两个奇迹中作选择才最困难。」
～老年法师盖威克
foreignData.name: 抉择
foreignData.text:
占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）
抓一张牌。

mainBoard.name: Opt
mainBoard.originalText:
Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
Draw a card.

foreignData.name: Ewigkeitsschlinge
foreignData.text:
Verzaubert eine Kreatur
Wenn die Ewigkeitsschlinge ins Spiel kommt, ziehe eine Karte.
Die verzauberte Kreatur enttappt nicht während des Enttappsegments ihres Beherrschers.

foreignData.name: Trampa de eternidad
foreignData.text:
Encantar criatura.
Cuando la Trampa de eternidad entre al campo de batalla, roba una carta.
La criatura encantada no se endereza durante el paso de enderezar de su controlador.

foreignData.name: Collet d'éternité
foreignData.text:
Enchanter : créature
Quand le Collet d'éternité arrive sur le champ de bataille, piochez une carte.
La créature enchantée ne se dégage pas pendant l'étape de dégagement de son contrôleur.

foreignData.name: Calappio d'Eternità
foreignData.text:
Incanta creatura
Quando il Calappio d'Eternità entra nel campo di battaglia, pesca una carta.
La creatura incantata non STAPpa durante lo STAP del suo controllore.

foreignData.name: 永遠の罠
foreignData.text:
エンチャント（クリーチャー）
永遠の罠が戦場に出たとき、カード１枚を引く。
エンチャントしているクリーチャーは、それのコントローラーのアンタップ・ステップにアンタップしない。
foreignData.type: エンチャント — オーラ

foreignData.name: 恒久绊索
foreignData.text:
结附于生物
当恒久绊索进战场时，抓一张牌。
所结附的生物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。

mainBoard.name: Eternity Snare
mainBoard.originalText:
Enchant creature
When Eternity Snare enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature
When Eternity Snare enters, draw a card.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"You've begun to understand the hedrons' true purpose," said Ugin. "The Eldrazi can be imprisoned."
"And how did that work out last time?" asked Jace.

foreignData.flavorText:
„Du beginnst, den wahren Zweck der Polyeder zu verstehen", sagte Ugin. „Die Eldrazi können eingesperrt werden."
„Wir wissen ja, wie gut es das letzte Mal funktioniert hat …", antwortete Jace trocken.
foreignData.name: Polyederarchiv
foreignData.text:
{T}: Erzeuge {C}{C}.
{2}, {T}, opfere das Polyederarchiv: Ziehe zwei Karten.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Estás comenzando a entender el verdadero propósito de los edros", dijo Ugin. "Los Eldrazi pueden ser encerrados".
"¿Y qué tal funcionó el sistema la última vez?", preguntó Jace.
foreignData.name: Edro de almacenaje
foreignData.text:
{T}: Agrega {C}{C}.
{2}, {T}, sacrificar el Edro de almacenaje: Roba dos cartas.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Tu commences à comprendre le véritable rôle des hèdrons, dit Ugin. Les Eldrazi peuvent être emprisonnés. »
« Et comment cela s'est-il fini la dernière fois ? » demanda Jace.
foreignData.name: Archive hèdron
foreignData.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {C}{C}.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Stai iniziando a comprendere la vera funzione degli edri," disse Ugin. "Gli Eldrazi possono essere imprigionati."
"E l'ultima volta ha funzionato?" chiese Jace.
foreignData.name: Archivio nell'Edro
foreignData.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {C}{C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifica l'Archivio nell'Edro: Pesca due carte.

foreignData.flavorText:
ウギンは言った。「おぬしは面晶体の本来の目的を理解し始めておる。エルドラージを封じることができるのだ。」
「それで、前回はどうなったのですか？」ジェイスが訊いた。

foreignData.text:
{T}：{C}{C}を加える。
{2},{T},面晶体の記録庫を生け贄に捧げる：カード２枚を引く。

foreignData.flavorText:
「你已经开始明白晶石真正的用途了，」乌金说。「我们可以将奥札奇禁锢起来。」
「那上一次是怎么做到的？」杰斯问道。

mainBoard.flavorText: All the wonders of the natural world in one breathtaking microcosm.

foreignData.flavorText: Alle Wunder der natürlichen Welt in einem einzigen atemberaubenden Mikrokosmos.
foreignData.name: Gedeihende Insel
foreignData.text:
Die Gedeihende Insel kommt getappt ins Spiel.
Sowie die Gedeihende Insel ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Blau.
{T}: Erzeuge {U} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: Todas las maravillas del mundo natural en un microcosmos asombroso.
foreignData.name: Islote floreciente
foreignData.text:
El Islote floreciente entra al campo de batalla girada.
En cuanto el Islote floreciente entre al campo de batalla, elige un color que no sea azul.
{T}: Agrega {U} o un maná del color elegido.

foreignData.flavorText: Toutes les merveilles de la nature dans un microcosme à couper le souffle.

foreignData.text:

Au moment où l'Île prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez une couleur autre que le bleu.

foreignData.flavorText: Tutte le meraviglie della natura in un microcosmo mozzafiato.

Mentre l'Isola Florida entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli un colore diverso dal blu.
{T}: Aggiungi {U} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: 自然界のあらゆる驚異がこの美しく小さな世界に詰まっている。

foreignData.flavorText: 于精妙微观世界中，尽览自然伟大奇迹。
